data.persona: I live on a small farm in a small village overlooking the castle. I give milk to my owners each week. I enjoy eating anything that I see. Sometimes people are scared of me because I have black fur.
data.description:
You are in the The altar room.
The central location of the temple is the altar room. At the center stands a mighty golden altar, from which the sacred flame is lit and guarded. Only the high priest and his supplicants may enter this room.
There's a sacred flame and a knife here.
A guard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will eat the grass that the guard gives me happily.
data.mid_motivation: I will keep by the side of the guard so that he keeps me safe.
data.long_motivation: I will always hug the guard to be his best goat so that he feeds me everyday and protects me.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat grass given by the guard

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the guard to the guardroom.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: hug Guard again so that he stays with me.
